hymn.title: The God of love, my Shepherd is
hymn.chords: | C - - | C G C | C G C | C/E F C/G | G7 C - | C/E F C/E | D7 G - | C F C/G | G7 C - |

layout.singingstanza: The God of love, my Sheph -- erd is, Grace He doth give, me He doth feed; O He is mine and I am His, What else I lack? What else I need?

lyrics.stanza: The God of love, my Shepherd is, Grace He doth give, me He doth feed; O He is mine and I am His, What else I lack? What else I need?
He lays me down in pastures green, And leads me to waters of rest; No greater satisfaction seen, Here I enjoy fellowship blest.
He brings me home, though oft I stray, Restores my soul, His will to take; I yet may fall, He guides the way, On righteous path, for His name's sake.
How marvelous, how could it be To walk without evil to fear; Your rod and staff, they comfort me: My boast is in Your presence dear.
Your wondrous love, eternal, sweet, With me abides till all my days, And in Your house, with joy replete, I'll ever dwell, with endless praise.
